name: Easy Challenging Solitaire
description:
A brand new free classic Solitaire game! But more fun and easier!

Solitaire Tycoon Era is a brand new mobile card game based on the classic Solitaire. It will be the best choice for fun and relaxing. You can play easily with boosters of many kinds and earn rewards! Also! There are lots of solitaire puzzles for the challenge. You may love it if you play Pyramid, Freecell, logic puzzle, or Spider Solitaire.

Features:
-100% Free to play
-Easy and Fun, you will pick up soon with tutorials
-Rewards daily and hourly
-Infinite fantastic levels
-Difficult puzzles for challenges
-Lots of boosters to play easily
-Lucky drawing for bonuses
-Achievement Collection
-Coins earning for each level finished
-Clean and user-friendly menus
-Simple tap to move cards
-Support for playing offline
-Endless free tips

Download now and play for free!
